name: Raindrop's Beast Senses
body:
**Source** Paizo Gamemastery Guide pg. 96
-
Requirements You are wearing Raindrop.
Effect Raindrop grants you an animalâ€™s acute senses as long as you wear it. You gain low-light vision. If you already have low-light vision, you instead gain darkvision. At 10th level, Raindrop grants you imprecise scent with a range of 10 feet.
